About PBL Hub

PBL Hub was developed by Jo√£o Paulo Just Peixoto (jpjust) to help Professors at State University of Feira de Santana to easily store information about their PBL sessions using their smartphones.

If you want to contact me, mail just1982@gmail.com
Use this list to manage your PBL classes. To edit or delete a class, just tap on it.
Type the name of the PBL Class you want to add.
If you delete this class, all its groups, sessions and students will also be deleted. Continue?
Use this list to manage your PBL groups. To edit or delete a group, just tap on it.
Type the name of the PBL Group you want to add.
There are no classes added. You need to add a class before adding a group.
If you delete this group, all its sessions and students will also be deleted. Continue?
Use this list to manage the groups\' problems. To edit or delete a problem, just tap on it.
Type the title of the problem you want to add.
Type the description of this problem.
There are no groups added. You need to add a group before adding a problem.
If you delete this problem, all its sessions will also be deleted. Continue?
Use this list to manage your PBL students. To edit or delete a student, just tap on it.
Choose a group from the list
Type the ID number of this student.
Type the name of the student you want to add.
There are no groups added. You need to add a group before adding a student.
If you delete this student, all its sessions performance grades will also be deleted. Continue?
Choose a problem from the list
Choose a group from the list
Insert the date of this session
Type the goals defined after this session
Use this list to manage your PBL sessions. To edit or delete a session, just tap on it.
You need to save this session before opening its performance screen.
There are no problems added. You need to add a problem before adding a session.
If you delete this session, all its performance grades will also be deleted. Continue?
